TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BuildSubmissionCompleteCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The submission that initiates the build.
Docs.summary: A callback function that receives notification when a build completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When this delegate is invoked, the `WaitHandle` on the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Execution.BuildSubmission> will have been be signaled and the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Execution.BuildResult.OverallResult%2A> will be valid.
